body.p: At the October term 1861 of the Montegomery quarterly court Green Boling was fined ten dollars & costs for a breach of the peace and was since replevied & is now absent a soldier in the US Service and the security will have it to pay, Boling was drunk when he committed the offence and is a good citizen when sober & I would ask his excellency Gov Magoffin to remit the fine

Mongomery Cir. Ct
$10. } Breach of the Peace
Green Boling
Issd Mar. 5. 1862
